categories.name: Main
data: Need to contact staff? Use `/ticket add [info about the problem]` to open a support ticket and the next available staff member will get to you right away. **In case of an emergency, mention @Staff. Abuse will lead to instant ban without notice.**
Use `?rank Updates` to receive notifications when Matty posts or goes live.
Use `?ranks` to view the available game roles you can join. You can join/leave a role by using `?rank [role name]`.

categories.name: Permission based Roles
data: `Trusted (1)` - Create server invites, can change nickname and add message reactions.
**Abuse of the following will get your server score reset!**
